1.0.name: wordpress/image-upload-helper
1.0.description:
WordPress has a wonderful JavaScript/iframe dialog for uploading or choosing images to use in posts or as featured thumbnails. Repurposing this dialog for other uses is difficult. Image Upload Helper is a simple library that helps you add an image upload/selection field anywhere in the WordPress admin, using a single function.

Created by Flightless with significant credit to Modern Tribe
